DOC.brief_summary: Volume control ventilation ( VCV ) common use ventilation mode general anesthesia . But VCV cause high airway peak pressure patient steep Trendelenberg position pneumoperitoneum . Autoflow-VCV reduce airway peak pressure improve dynamic compliance . We compare parameter ( arterial blood gas analysis , airway compliance , etc ) group apply VCV autoflow-VCV RALP .
DOC.brief_title: Volume Controlled Ventilation v Autoflow-volume Controlled Ventilation
DOC.detailed_description: Robot assist laparoscopic radical prostatectomy ( RALP ) use treatment prostate cancer since 2001 . RALP offer advantage reduce blood loss , spar nerve , less postoperative pain . However , RALP require steep Trendelenberg position pneumoperitoneum . It cause increase airway peak pressure unwanted hemodynamic effect conventional volume control ventilation ( VCV ) . Autoflow-VCV use decelerate flow , reduce airway peak pressure improve dynamic compliance . We compare parameter ( arterial blood gas analysis , airway compliance , etc ) group apply VCV autoflow-VCV RALP .
DOC.criteria: Adult ( age 1965 ) American Society Anesthesiology Classification IIII cardiovascular disease , cerebrovascular disease , pulmonary disease BMI 30
